Sentencas: La0.7Sr0.3Fe0.9Ni0.1O3-delta (LSFNi) and La0.6Ce0.1Sr0.3Fe0.9Ni0.1O3-delta (CLSFNi) are synthesized and applied for use as symmetrical electrodes in direct-methane solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Ce-doped La0.7Sr0.3Fe0.9Ni0.1O3-δ as symmetrical electrodes for high performance direct hydrocarbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In a symmetric SOFC, the same electrode material is used for both the anode and cathode and must therefore remain active in both oxidizing and reducing atmospheres.
Titulo: Ce-doped La0.7Sr0.3Fe0.9Ni0.1O3-δ as symmetrical electrodes for high performance direct hydrocarbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: LSFNi and CLSFNi retain their stable perovskite phase at high temperature in both oxidizing and moderately reducing environments, with a minor amount of SrLaFeO4 phase (K2NiF4 structure) present under reducing conditions.
Titulo: Ce-doped La0.7Sr0.3Fe0.9Ni0.1O3-δ as symmetrical electrodes for high performance direct hydrocarbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Symmetric SOFCs incorporating either LSFNi or CLSFNi electrodes give excellent peak power densities of similar to 900 mW cm(-2) at 850 degrees C in wet H-2/air (3% H2O).
Titulo: Ce-doped La0.7Sr0.3Fe0.9Ni0.1O3-δ as symmetrical electrodes for high performance direct hydrocarbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In wet CH4/air (3% H2O), the CLSFNi electrode greatly outperforms the LSFNi electrode (522 mW cm(-2) vs. 221 mW cm(-2)) due to the enhanced methane reforming activity imparted by the cerium doping.
Titulo: Ce-doped La0.7Sr0.3Fe0.9Ni0.1O3-δ as symmetrical electrodes for high performance direct hydrocarbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The performance and stability of the CLSFNi symmetric cell under direct CH4 operation are among the best reported to date in the literature, indicating that CLSFNi is a promising electrode material for symmetrical SOFCs.
Titulo: Ce-doped La0.7Sr0.3Fe0.9Ni0.1O3-δ as symmetrical electrodes for high performance direct hydrocarbon solid oxide fuel cells
